results.title: Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Long-term effects of combined @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment on the @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Signs_and_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013568 @@@clinical abnormalities@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@ovulation dysfunction@@@ in single young @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Seyam E, Hefzy E. Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome. Gynecol Endocrinol. 2018 Dec;34(12):1073-1080. PMID: 30044162
citations.BibTeX: @article{30044162, title={Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome.}, author={Seyam E and Hefzy E}, journal={Gynecol Endocrinol}, volume={34}, number={12}, pages={1073-1080}}

results.title: Effects of Brown Seaweed (Sargassum polycystum) Extracts on Kidney, Liver, and Pancreas of Type 2 Diabetic Rat Model
results.text_hl: After 22 days of treatment, the @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Signs_and_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013568 @@@pathological lesions@@@ of the livers and kidneys in the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were quantitatively and qualitatively alleviated (P < 0.05) by both the @SPECIES_127578 @@@SP@@@ extracts at 150 mg/kg body weight and by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Motshakeri M, Ebrahimi M, Goh YM, Othman HH, Hair-Bejo M, Mohamed S. Effects of Brown Seaweed (Sargassum polycystum) Extracts on Kidney, Liver, and Pancreas of Type 2 Diabetic Rat Model Evid Based Complement Alternat Med. 2014;2014():379407. PMID: 24516503
citations.BibTeX: @article{24516503, title={Effects of Brown Seaweed (Sargassum polycystum) Extracts on Kidney, Liver, and Pancreas of Type 2 Diabetic Rat Model}, author={Motshakeri M and Ebrahimi M and Goh YM and Othman HH and Hair-Bejo M and Mohamed S}, journal={Evid Based Complement Alternat Med}, volume={2014}, pages={379407}}

results.title: Effect of long-term treatment with metformin added to hypocaloric diet on body composition, fat distribution, and androgen and insulin levels in abdominally obese women with and without the polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Dietary-induced @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@ and the administration of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-lowering drugs, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, are usually followed by improved @DISEASE_Hyperandrogenism @DISEASE_MESH:D017588 @@@hyperandrogenism@@@ and related @<m>DISEASE_Pathological_Conditions_Signs_and_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013568 @@@clinical abnormalities@@@.

citations.NLM: Pasquali R, Gambineri A, Biscotti D, Vicennati V, Gagliardi L, Colitta D, Fiorini S, Cognigni GE, Filicori M, Morselli-Labate AM. Effect of long-term treatment with metformin added to hypocaloric diet on body composition, fat distribution, and androgen and insulin levels in abdominally obese women with and without the polycystic ovary syndrome. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2000 Aug;85(8):2767-74. PMID: 10946879
citations.BibTeX: @article{10946879, title={Effect of long-term treatment with metformin added to hypocaloric diet on body composition, fat distribution, and androgen and insulin levels in abdominally obese women with and without the polycystic ovary syndrome.}, author={Pasquali R and Gambineri A and Biscotti D and Vicennati V and Gagliardi L and Colitta D and Fiorini S and Cognigni GE and Filicori M and Morselli-Labate AM}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={85}, number={8}, pages={2767-74}}
